sen.j: 高安勝久（たかやす かつひさ、1948年（昭和23年）-）は、ワキ方高安流能楽師。
sen.e: Katsuhisa TAKAYASU (1948 -) is a Noh actor of the Takayasu school of supporting actors (waki-kata).
Katsuhisa TAKAYASU (1948 -) is a Noh actor of the Takayasu school of waki-kata (supporting actors).
Katsuhisa TAKAYASU (1948 -) is a Noh actor of the Takayasu school of waki-kata (supporting actors).
The 14th head of the Takayasu school of supporting actors
The 14th head of the Takayasu school.
sen.cmt: of supporting actors削除、ピリオド追加
sen.e: The 14th head of the Takayasu school.
The present head of the school
The present head of the school.
The present head of the school.

sen.j: 十二世宗家西村滋郎の子。
sen.e: He is a son of Shigero NISHIMURA the 12th.
He is a son of Shigero NISHIMURA, the 12th head of the school.
sen.cmt: 12th→, 12th head of the schoolとしました。
sen.e: He is a son of Shigero NISHIMURA, the 12th head of the school.

sen.j: 十三世宗家西村欽也は叔父にあたる。
sen.e: Kinya NISHIMURA the 13th is his uncle.
Kinya NISHIMURA, the 13th head of the school, is his uncle.
sen.cmt: 13th→, 13th head of the school, としました。
sen.e: Kinya NISHIMURA, the 13th head of the school, is his uncle.
He is doing his activities mainly in Nagoya.
He is doing his activities mainly in Nagoya.
He is doing his activities mainly in Nagoya.
